articles.headline: TAXES Finding the biggest deadbeats
articles.summary: The article highlights the investigation on tax delinquents in Charlotte County to identify top property tax defaulters, revealing significant uncollected taxes due to inaction by the tax collector's office.

articles.headline: SPOTLIGHT: JOBS, PAY & PERKS
articles.summary: An analysis of Hartford's police officer salaries unveils extensive overtime pay leading to significantly high gross incomes, with some patrol officers earning over $100,000, much more than their base salary.

articles.headline: FIRST VENTURE Learning lessons while tracing pol's spending
articles.summary: An exploration into a New York state senator's campaign finance, raising questions about the implications of campaign spending and gifts related to political influence and ethics.

articles.headline: Bits & Bytes - Historical spending data
articles.summary: A briefing on available historical federal spending data compiled by IRE and NICAR, allowing journalists to better analyze past governmental fiscal activities.
